sections.heading: of Transportation; construction contracts authorized
sections.text: The Department of Transportation shall be authorized to enter into contracts for the construction of viaducts or subways, in accordance with plans and specifications approved under section 18-601, immediately upon the approval by the voters of the

18-613.Department of Transportation; construction contracts authorized.

The Department of Transportation shall be authorized to enter into contracts for the construction of viaducts or subways, in accordance with plans and specifications approved under section 18-601, immediately upon the approval by the voters of the issuance of bonds under section 18-610.

SourceLaws 1935, Spec. Sess., c. 34, § 13, p. 199;C.S.Supp.,1941, § 18-1913;R.S.1943, § 18-613;Laws 2017, LB339, § 80;Laws 2021, LB163, § 50.
